thread.title: New York City Traffic Fatalities Fell in 2017 by 7%, Report Says

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York City Traffic Fatalities Fell in 2017 by 7%, Report Says

organizations.name: new york city traffic fatalities fell

text:
Traffic fatalities fell 7% in New York City last year, according to a report released by Mayor Bill de Blasio Friday.
Pedestrian deaths last year dropped from 148 to 101, but driver, cyclist and motorcycle fatalities each rose.

Marco Conner, legislative director for Transportation Alternatives, an advocacy group, praised the reduction in pedestrian...
